item.description:
let's check out a cool duo, bird mancini, at the clear conscience cafe in cambridge's central square.

bird mancini bill themselves as "stubbornly eclectic"; others call them "Annie Lennox meets Tom Waits" and "infectious and addictive".

check out some of their music on their myspace page.

the c3 is a new venue for Boston Live Music; a funky little coffeehouse in cambridge's central square. it's small, so there's a limit of eight for this meetup.

note that david lafleur is playing first, at 8 pm, and bird mancini is playing from 9-10 pm.

i'll be there by 8 p.m. to try to snag some seating....
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to everyone who RSVPs 'Yes' by 15 october, 6 p.m.
item.name: Bird Mancini @ The Clear Conscience Cafe
